description: This file defines a LightningJS component named 'Loader' which displays animated circles as a loading indicator. It imports external LightningJS library modules and exports a component with properties, state, lifecycle hooks, and methods.

classes.name: Loader
classes.description: A LightningJS component displaying an animated circle-based loading indicator.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Begins an interval that toggles the alpha transparency of the circles to create a fade animation.
